attributes.action: To refuse to implement the referendum decision to leave the EU
attributes.additional_details:
YouGov EU Referendum On The Day Poll (23/06/16)
http://d25d2506sfb94s.cloudfront.net/cumulus_uploads/document/640yx5m0rx/On_the_Day_FINAL_poll_forwebsite.pdf

18-24yrs - 75% remain : 25% leave
25-49yrs - 56% remain : 44% leave
attributes.background: While it's true that a majority of the UK public voted to leave the EU, the margin was narrow and the decision will have a long-lasting impact on our young people who according to the YouGov EU Referendum On The Day Poll (23/06/16) voted 3:1 to remain (18-25 yrs). How is it fair to do this to them?

rejection.details:
We don't know who you are asking to reject the outcome of the referendum. If you want Parliament to reject it, you can sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/148969
